sense.def:
A lecture
je govor, ki ga nekdo ima, ko ljudi poučuje določeni predmet.

To lecture
pomeni imeti predavanje ali vrsto predavanj.

seg.quote: He lectured on Economic History at the University.

sense.def:
To lecture someone about something
pomeni nekoga kritizirati ali mu povedati, kako bi se moral vesti.

seg.quote: I had always been lectured about not talking with my mouth full.

sense.def:
A lecture
je tudi ostra kritika, ki jo nekdo pove o nečem, kar mu ni všeč.

seg.quote: He'll give her a lecture on her responsibilities.
